vision_analysis.question_text: What further actions would you expect from a brand that claims to be traceable?
clickable_elements: Demonstrating how traceability enables them to reward farmers more effectively or ensure fair prices
Showing the journey of the product through the various stages of the supply chain (e.g., processing, shipping, roasting)
Sharing stories and profiles of the farmers or co-operatives at the origin
Highlighting how their traceability efforts contribute to their overall sustainability goals
Allowing customers to trace the specific batch or package they purchased back to its origin
Educating consumers on the importance of traceability and why it matters for sustainable and ethical sourcing

automation.question_text:
What further actions would you expect from a brand that claims to be traceable?

We can trace 100% of our tea and coffee
We believe that transparency is key to sourcing responsibly. All our tea and coffee is traceable down to the farm or co-operative where it was grown. We publish our entire supply chain on our website.

Please select all that apply
